channel.title: Runescape Login screen
channel.description:
[b]Most/all interface text.[/b] [code] interface #15259) Message = Welcome to Runescape interface #15260) Message = You last logged in @red@%1@bla@ days ago from @red@%2 interface #15261) Message = 1
2
3
4
5
6 interface #15262) Message = Jagex Staff will NEVER email you. We use the
message centre on this website instead. interface #15263) Message = You have %1 unread messages
in your message centre. interface #15264) Message = Last Password Change:
%1 interface #15265) Message = 1
2
3
4
5 interface #15266) Message = CLICK HERE TO PLAY interface #15267) Message = null interface #15268) Message = To change your recovery questions:
1) Logout and return to the frontpage of this website.
2) Choose 'Set new recovery questions'. interface #15269) Message = To view your messages:
1) Logout and return to the frontpage of this website.
2) Choose 'Read your messages from Jagex'. interface #15270) Message = 1
2
3
4 interface #15271) Message = To change your password:
1) Logout and return to the frontpage of this website.
2) Choose 'Change your password'.[/code]
[b]Interface ID[/b] [code]15244[/code]
Yah, so ive gotten the RS2 login screen from a interface dump and the text from a interfacetext dump.
heres a picture: [img]http://www.auto-rune.co.uk/images/loginscreen.jpg[/img]
Any ideas on getting it full screen?

item.title: Runescape Login screen

@system wrote:

I am no super-coder but i beleive this should become after you log in, before all the things load, uhm?

Lol, i’m kinda guessing but i think im on the right lines…

item.title: Runescape Login screen

item.description:

Most/all interface text.

interface #15259) Message = Welcome to Runescape interface #15260) Message = You last logged in @red@%1@bla@ days ago from @red@%2 interface #15261) Message = 1\n2\n3\n4\n5\n6 interface #15262) Message = Jagex Staff will NEVER email you. We use the\nmessage centre on this website instead. interface #15263) Message = You have %1 unread messages\nin your message centre. interface #15264) Message = Last Password Change:\n%1 interface #15265) Message = 1\n2\n3\n4\n5 interface #15266) Message = CLICK HERE TO PLAY interface #15267) Message = null interface #15268) Message = To change your recovery questions:\n1) Logout and return to the frontpage of this website.\n2) Choose 'Set new recovery questions'. interface #15269) Message = To view your messages:\n1) Logout and return to the frontpage of this website.\n2) Choose 'Read your messages from Jagex'. interface #15270) Message = 1\n2\n3\n4 interface #15271) Message = To change your password:\n1) Logout and return to the frontpage of this website.\n2) Choose 'Change your password'.

Interface ID

15244

Yah, so ive gotten the RS2 login screen from a interface dump and the text from a interfacetext dump.
